column5: Thanks for the priveledge my friend...maybe next time the big fish will be more co-operative, not that there is anything wrong with catching some WGSF and small smallies...  Maybe if we coax Cliff he will post pics here of his new ride...  Hell...If it was my boat I'd be bragging all over the place !!!
Now I know why you skipped out on Lakair... you sly dog you!!!
That is the second time you have had that honour, however I am sure Cliff didn't toss you overboard.....

The pleasure was all mine my friend, sorry I couldn't get us into some bigger fishes, the catching was slow but the company was wonderful. I'll post a picture once I get the rod holders mounted and stuff like that.
Glad you guys had a good day out,  looking forward to the pics of the new ride Cliff...  Maureen
